text: @piersmorgan @RishiSunak I absolutely agree! A Gentleman in every regard and single handedly the Only Person on the Cabinet worth listening to. Always succinct, on point and always engaged with the mood of the Nation. Rishi Sunak has the ability to lead this Country. Meet the New #PM! #COVID19
